name: A Peek Through Time VR
description:
This game is a sort of take on the Portal style puzzle. It's got two main mechanics, rewinding objects, and looking through time.

I may have been a little too ambitious with this project. Getting the mechanics down correctly ate most of my time which left very little time for visuals, music, and level design. 

https://github.com/SarahiManzor/BrackeysJam2020
